name: RockcastRadio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rockcast radio
des:
Rockcast Radio plays the best of hard rock and metal from 2000-now, with an occasional song older than that. We have been on the air for 6 years rocking the likes of Shinedown, Slipknot, Three Days Grace, Five Five Finger Death Punch, Atreyu, Black Veil Brides, Saul, Theory Of A Deadman and similar. 

We have great talent who knows the music. We also are proud to introduce you to new bands both with music and exclusive interviews. We have some of our own shows and programs like the Dirty Dozen countdown, Monster Rock, Premiere Rock, Rock Discoveries and more. We also carry great syndicated shows like Hard, Heavy & Hair, Back To The Arena and Unabashed. 

We bring in new music every week and rock the big hits too. Come rock with us on Rockcast Radio!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
